argumentText:
ARGUMENT
x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_ordtr | |- ( Ord A -> Tr A ) |
| 2 |  | #P_suctr | |- ( Tr A -> Tr suc A ) |
| 3 | 1, 2 | #P_syl | |- ( Ord A -> Tr suc A ) |
| 4 |  | #P_df-suc | |- suc A = ( A u. { A } ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_eleq2i | |- ( x e. suc A <-> x e. ( A u. { A } ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_elun | |- ( x e. ( A u. { A } ) <-> ( x e. A \/ x e. { A } ) ) |
| 7 |  | #P_elsn | |- ( x e. { A } <-> x = A ) |
| 8 | 7 | #P_orbi2i | |- ( ( x e. A \/ x e. { A } ) <-> ( x e. A \/ x = A ) ) |
| 9 | 5, 6, 8 | #P_3bitri | |- ( x e. suc A <-> ( x e. A \/ x = A ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_df-iord | |- ( Ord A <-> ( Tr A /\ A. x e. A Tr x ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_simprbi | |- ( Ord A -> A. x e. A Tr x ) |
| 12 |  | #P_df-ral | |- ( A. x e. A Tr x <-> A. x ( x e. A -> Tr x ) ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_sylib | |- ( Ord A -> A. x ( x e. A -> Tr x ) ) |
| 14 | 13 | #P_19.21bi | |- ( Ord A -> ( x e. A -> Tr x ) ) |
| 15 |  | #P_treq | |- ( x = A -> ( Tr x <-> Tr A ) ) |
| 16 | 1, 15 | #P_syl5ibrcom | |- ( Ord A -> ( x = A -> Tr x ) ) |
| 17 | 14, 16 | #P_jaod | |- ( Ord A -> ( ( x e. A \/ x = A ) -> Tr x ) ) |
| 18 | 9, 17 | #P_syl5bi | |- ( Ord A -> ( x e. suc A -> Tr x ) ) |
| 19 | 18 | #P_ralrimiv | |- ( Ord A -> A. x e. suc A Tr x ) |
| 20 |  | #P_df-iord | |- ( Ord suc A <-> ( Tr suc A /\ A. x e. suc A Tr x ) ) |
| 21 | 3, 19, 20 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( Ord A -> Ord suc A ) |
